00051 // if using 8 bits for ADC, define this flag in your compiler options
00053 #ifdef USE_ADC_8_BITS
00054 #  define ADC_MAX_VALUE    0xFF
00055 #else
00056 #  define ADC_MAX_VALUE    0x3FF
00057 #endif
